title: Nemesis mode and queue dodges
body:
Hey guys, today I entered the queue of my first ever nemesis mode, and when we all got just finished banning, before either team even selected a champion, my computer suddenly black screened the first time in months, which will leave me with no special icon after the mode finishes due to the dodge penalty.
I would like to restate that neither team has even selected a champion, and thus, the unintential dodge had no impact over anything, but I feel that this is rather unfair as the reasons for dodging isn't always to escape having to use a bad champion. For example, when you just got into the lobby when a group of your friends came on and asked you to play, often times the dodge function is used so that they could join their friends. However, if they are in a queue for nemesis, they would be conflicted between joining their friends or keeping their icon.

Sorry for the rant but I would just like to throw this out there, hopefully Riot could one day put a solution to this.

replies.body:
Its not a very good icon, in my opinion, and I wouldn't care if I didn't get it. However, I feel your pain, because if his treatment is used in other gamemodes the same thing is gonna come out. I think it should be something based on the amount you dodge and the amount you play.
For example, if someone dodges one game and finishes ten, I think they should still get the icon.

Do we not get the icon if we dodge a game?

Oh.

I accidentally dodged a game because I was picking at the same time as someone else. Realised I only had two seconds left, tried to click Janna.

The other person clicked Janna first.

And I accidentally didn't pick a champ.

gg
Pretty much the same, except I never realised until I was kicked from the lobby. I want the icon, whatever it is :c
That happened to me as well but with a sion pick :O

Its an icon, I don't think all that many people care.

So far 3 games, 1 afker, 1 completely full of rage and the final one with a feeder and a troll. The mode seems to bring out the worst in people (and yes sadly that includes myself). Theres just something about giving the enemy 3 ap then the final guy on our team giving them shaco and spamming lol. Or us having 5 tanks and then someone gives them garen. Or when the guy i'm supporting bot gets on a killing spree and decides to run into the enemy and die while simply saying lel. I'll try a few more but this mode is even easier than a normal SR game for a single person to just make downright unfun.
Yeah, just one dodge for no reward is a pretty harsh punishment, and would actually drive the players that actually want the icons away from the game mode, which is very counter productive.
